name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Dogecoin Draws More Public Company
text:
Synopsis
Public companies are increasingly showing interest in Dogecoin, with potential for broader institutional adoption through proposed ETF listings, while the crypto market remains sensitive to geopolitical trade tensions.

Key Insights
- Neptune Digital Assets purchased 1 million DOGE tokens (valued at $270,000) and 20 additional bitcoin
- Bitwise, Osprey Funds, and Rex Shares are seeking to launch spot Dogecoin ETFs in the U.S.
- Bitcoin dropped below $100,000 in response to China's planned retaliatory tariffs on U.S. imports
- Ethereum increased its gas limit to over 31 million, the first such increase under proof-of-stake
- U.S. Ethereum ETFs hit a record $1.5 billion in daily trading volume on February 3
- Taproot Wizards, a Bitcoin Ordinals project, raised $30 million to advance smart contract functionality on Bitcoin
- Ether experienced a 36% price drop following trade tariff announcements before recovering
